[ti:Take You Dancing]
[ar:Jason Derulo]
[al:Take You Dancing]

[00:00.00]Take You Dancing - Jason Derulo
[00:00.22]Lyrics by：Jason Desrouleaux/Emanuel Kiriakou/Teemu Brunila/Sarah Solovay/Shawn Charles
[00:00.44]Da da da da da da
[00:02.44]Da da da da da da
[00:04.48]Da da da da da da
[00:06.61]Da da da da da da
[00:08.02]Jason Derulo
[00:09.31]Pull up skrt skrt on your body
[00:11.83]Performing just like my rari
[00:13.90]You too fine
[00:15.01]Need a ticket
[00:16.03]I bet you taste expensive
[00:18.23]Pouring up up by the liter
[00:20.22]If you keeping up you's a keeper
[00:22.38]Tequila and vodka girl you might be a problem
[00:26.78]Run away run away run away run away I know that I should
[00:30.86]But my heart wanna stay wanna stay wanna stay wanna stay now
[00:35.14]You can see it in my eyes that I wanna take you down right now if I could
[00:39.30]So I hope you know what I mean when I say
[00:44.04]Let me take you dancing
[00:45.98]Two step to the bedroom
[00:48.02]We don't need no dance floor
[00:50.19]Let me see your best move
[00:52.30]Anything could happen ever since I met you
[00:56.55]No need to imagine baby all I'm asking is let me take you dancing
[01:02.92]Like da da da da da da
[01:05.06]Da da da da da da
[01:07.14]Da da da da da da
[01:09.26]Da da da da da da
[01:10.92]If you know what I mean
[01:12.02]Da da da da da da
[01:13.56]Da da da da da da
[01:15.62]Da da da da da da
[01:17.80]Da da da da da da
[01:20.87]Pull up skrt skrt on your body
[01:23.05]It's just us two in this party
[01:25.13]That Louis that Prada looks so much better off ya
[01:29.54]Turn me up up up be my waitress
[01:31.57]Now we not in love so let's make it
[01:33.66]Tequila and vodka girl you might be a problem
[01:37.97]Run away run away run away run away I know that I should
[01:42.11]But my heart wanna stay wanna stay wanna stay wanna stay now
[01:46.29]You can see it in my eyes that I wanna take you down right now if I could
[01:50.62]So I hope you know what I mean when I say
[01:55.22]Let me take you dancing
[01:57.09]Two step to the bedroom
[01:59.25]We don't need no dance floor
[02:01.43]Let me see your best move
[02:03.46]Anything could happen ever since I met you
[02:07.73]No need to imagine baby all I'm asking is let me take you dancing

[02:16.18]Da da da da da da
[02:18.35]Da da da da da da
[02:20.37]Da da da da da da
[02:22.20]If you know what I mean

[02:31.28]Let me take you dancing

[02:35.39]We don't need no dance floor

[02:39.69]Anything could happen ever since I met you
[02:43.91]No need to imagine baby all I'm asking

[02:52.30]Da da da da da da
[02:54.47]Da da da da da da
[02:56.59]Da da da da da da

data.trans:
[ti:Take You Dancing]
[ar:Jason Derulo]
[al:Take You Dancing]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.22]//
[00:00.44]//
[00:02.44]//
[00:04.48]//
[00:06.61]//
[00:08.02]//
[00:09.31]温柔爱抚着你的身体
[00:11.83]就像我的法拉利一样引人注目
[00:13.90]你太迷人了
[00:15.01]一般人都没机会接近
[00:16.03]我打赌 和你在一起的代价很昂贵
[00:18.23]放肆地饮酒
[00:20.22]如果你继续这样 你会让我放不下的
[00:22.38]龙舌兰和伏特加 姑娘 你或许会带来烦恼
[00:26.78]逃跑 我知道我该逃跑
[00:30.86]但我的心只想留在这里
[00:35.14]你从我的眼神就能看出来 如果可以的话 我想马上就把你推倒
[00:39.30]所以我希望你能明白我的意思
[00:44.04]让我带你去舞蹈
[00:45.98]跳着两步舞 走向卧室去
[00:48.02]我们不需要专门的舞池
[00:50.19]让我看看你最优美的舞步
[00:52.30]自从遇到你 仿佛一切都可能发生
[00:56.55]不需要想象 宝贝 我所有的要求就是让我带你去跳舞
[01:02.92]就这样舞蹈

[01:07.14]//
[01:09.26]//

[01:23.05]这场派对只有我们两个人
[01:25.13]路易·威登 普拉达 穿在你身上好看得多
[01:29.54]让我激动不已 做我的女服务员吧
[01:31.57]现在我们没在热恋中 所以就让我们释放激情吧
